## Description {#details}

Represents an array of some other type.

If present, this must be the last field in a record.

Definition at line 150 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/bitcode/bitcodeconvenience-h">BitcodeConvenience.h</a>.
